name: Clemont
effect: You start the game with Clemont's Heliolisk in your deck.

name: Clemont's Heliolisk
effect:
+2 Energy
Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.
Learn 6: Gain Parabolic Charge and put it in front of your Trainer.

name: Draco Meteor
effect: When you play Grant's Tyrunt, gain +3 Energy and you draw one less card at the end of your turn.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Force Palm
effect: When you play Korrina's Mienfoo, gain +1 Energy and choose an opponent. That opponent discards a random card. If that card costs 0, put it on top of their deck.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Future Sight
effect: When you play Olympia's Meowstic, gain +1 Energy and search your deck. You may discard up to three cards in your deck, then shuffle your deck.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Grant
effect: You start the game with Grant's Tyrunt in your deck.

name: Grant's Tyrunt
effect:
+2 Energy
Learn 6: Gain Draco Meteor and put it in front of your Trainer.

name: Gust
effect: When you play Viola's Vivillon, draw a card and choose either the Route or the Mega Evolution Line. Put all cards from the chosen zone on the bottom of its deck or stack, then refill that zone.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Korrina
effect: You start the game with Korrina's Mienfoo in your deck.

name: Korrina's Mienfoo
effect:
+2 Energy
Learn 6: Gain Force Palm and put it in front of your Trainer.

name: Moonblast
effect: When you play Valerie's Spritzee, gain +1 Energy and look at an opponent's hand. That opponent discards an Attack card of your choosing.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Olympia
effect: You start the game with Olympia's Meowstic in your deck.

name: Olympia's Meowstic
effect:
+1 Energy
You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card.
Learn 6: Gain Future Sight and put it in front of your Trainer.

name: Parabolic Charge
effect: When you play Clemont's Heliolisk, gain +1 Energy and each player discards all non-Status Conditions in front of their Trainer. For each card discarded this way, gain +1 Energy.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Ramos
effect: You start the game with Ramos's Gogoat in your deck.

name: Ramos's Gogoat
effect:
Shuffle a Pokemon from your discard pile into your deck.
Learn 6: Gain Razor Leaf and put it in front of your Trainer.

name: Rapid Spin
effect: Ongoing: You may put Wulfric's Cryogonal into play to ignore the effect of an Attack. If you do, draw a card then discard a card.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Razor Leaf
effect: When you play Ramos's Gogoat, gain +3 Energy and reveal the top card of the Main Deck. If that card costs 5 or more, Attack: Each opponent discards a card.
highlight_effect:
This stays in play in front of your Trainer.
This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

effect:
+2 Energy
Learn 6: Gain Moonblast and put it in front of your Trainer.

name: Wulfric
effect: You start the game with Wulfric's Cryogonla in your deck.

name: Wulfric's Cryogonal

At the start of your turn, if this is in play, put this into your hand.
